title: Dodged autofill so I'm creating work for forum mods
body: Yeah just thought I'd post here to waste some time because I got auto put into support. Don't like that feature so I'm going to shitpost and waste someone else's time as I cannot requeue for 5 minutes.

replies.body:
You're only wasting your own time.

You get protected from Auto-fill if you play one game with it.

Hell it's nowhere as bad as you lot complain about it either, past 20 games I've had Auto-fill on, and didn't get auto-filled once.

I have had loads of games where I'm "auto-fill protected", but still end up in different positions (I pick jg and mid). Maybe it turns back on after 5 mins in queue????? But the worst part is that, after I'm auto-filled after being protected from auto-fill, I lose my auto-fill protection...

That's impossible.

Once protected from auto-fill you are protected for about 3-4 games.
It is impossible for you to be auto-filled while under protection.
I know it should be impossible, but I still end up in positions other than the ones I pick. Maybe it's just my client that's buggy?
